entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming clear near midnight. Wind north 30 km/h. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 17 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CDT Tuesday 11 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 14 with temperature rising to minus 10 by morning. POP 30%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness early in the evening. 30 percent chance of light snow late in the evening and overnight. Wind north 30 km/h.
